system.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.3lOlQnDdQRaiR47g]{Talk Sense} by telling them their future, roll with +Doom.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: They believe you are lying to them, and they no longer trust you.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value: They do not require a favor of you, but they will do what they think is best based on the future you described to them.

success.label: Success!
success.value: They do exactly as you say without question.
